attributes.action: Pay NHS staff a salary that reflects how much they have given us
attributes.background: NHs staff have risked and sometimes sacrificed their lives to care for this nation. Please give them a wage increase that shows how indebted we are

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
